"" : "Loading"; axios .post("http://localhost:3001/user/signup", { fullname: this.state.fullname, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password }) .then(data => { console.log(data); this.setState({ isRegistered: true }); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err.response.data); this.setState({ error: err.response.data }); }); }; handle_Submit = e => { e.preventDefault(); //alert("Registration success!"); console.log(this.state); }; render() { return (
